name: 1.5.0-rc0
body: refactoring to have cleaner structure and smaller module

name: 1.4.1rc0
body:
- fix #77 Implement extra properties from json-logging-py
https://pypi.org/project/json-logging/1.4.1rc0/

name: 1.4.0rc
body:
add capability to customize extraction of request, response info #68

https://pypi.org/manage/project/json-logging/release/1.4.0rc0/

- fix Sanip IP information is a str not a list #63
https://pypi.org/project/json-logging/1.2.11/

https://pypi.org/project/json-logging/1.2.9/
fix #61 Using root logger + flask outside of flask request context throws RuntimeError

Fix condition for checking root logger handlers #53

https://pypi.org/project/json-logging/1.2.6/

exclude specific API endpoints from logging requests fix #44
https://pypi.org/project/json-logging/1.2.5/

- fix #45
 - fix #46
 - refactoring
 - optimization log record
https://pypi.org/project/json-logging/1.2.0/

name: Add the possibility to modify the formatter for request logs.

body:
- add method to support getting request logger by using method json_logging.get_request_logger(), fix #23
https://pypi.org/project/json-logging/1.0.2/

Breaking change:
 - add more specific init method for each framework
 - minor correct for ENABLE_JSON_LOGGING_DEBUG behaviour
 - update few code comments

https://pypi.org/project/json-logging/1.0.0/

name: fix: add japanese character encoding for json logger #24
body: fix: add japanese character encoding for json logger #24

name: Adds functionality to customize the the JSON - change keys, values, etc.
